message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering what it can do for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm looking to save some money on this purchase, and I'm not sure if the product is worth $130 to me.
I understand your desire to save, Bob, but $100 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $115. I'd be willing to consider $110. I'm trying to stay within my budget and get the best value for my money.
